backend/main.mo: Defines actor data types for users, hotels, bookings, payments, invites, and visibility, and initializes maps for storing profiles, tokens, and related records.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for recent Account Status and publishing updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend components, hooks, and pages describing their purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying base layout styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page configuring meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and loading the main React application root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining name, description, theme colors, icons, categories, and start behavior for the SGO application.
frontend/public/sw.js: Implements a versioned service worker that precaches core assets, cleans old caches, and uses network‑first fetching with selective caching for static resources.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Markdown checklist covering routes, authentication, Account Status role-based UI, backend-unavailable behavior, and booking flow tests before publishing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app with routing, themes, React Query, identity, i18n, and runs service worker cleanup on startup.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Generates and exports a build version and timestamp based on environment variables or a fallback value.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Displays Internet Identity account status, build version, and optional admin diagnostics with refresh and copy actions.
frontend/src/components/account/AdminRec: Shows an admin-only card for resetting admin access using a recovery token.
frontend/src/components/account/PrePubli: Provides a detailed pre‑publish checklist with verification steps and UI for tracking completion.
frontend/src/components/account/Publishi: UI card explaining how to deploy changes, retry failed deployments, and troubleshoot UI update issues.
frontend/src/components/account/Troubles: Provides controls for clearing React Query cache and disabling offline caching via service worker and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/components/admin/NextStepSe: Lets admins select a prioritized next-step feature using a radio group, with saved local state and loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResetAdmin: Form and dialog for restoring admin access via token, handling errors, sanitizing messages, and navigating after success.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders a simple footer with the current year and a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Provides the main header with navigation, language selection, auth-aware links, and an admin badge/menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the app’s page layout with header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireActo: Wrapper ensuring backend actor is initialized, showing loading, error, or warning states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Gate component requiring Internet Identity login, showing a loading state or login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/AdminBo: Displays all system bookings with loading, error, and scrollable list states, including status badges and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Provides a labeled date picker field using a popover calendar with validation, disabled dates, and optional error display.
Shows manual payment instructions with booking details, copy-to-clipboard support, and localized text.
Implements a booking request modal with date selection, room type, guest input, validation, submission, and payment instructions flow.
frontend/src/components/bookings/GuestBo: Lists a guest's bookings with status indicators, cancellation support, loading/error states, and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/bookings/HotelBo: Displays hotel-side booking requests with confirm/reject actions and full loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/common/PanelErro: React error boundary that catches panel rendering failures, shows a styled error card, and supports retrying via a callback.
frontend/src/components/diagnostics/Rout: Displays detailed routing and backend connection errors with retry options, copy helpers, and special handling for stopped canister states.
frontend/src/components/hotel/AdminHotel: Admin panel to generate, list, copy, and manage hotel invite tokens with loading, error, and refetch handling.
Admin interface for toggling hotel visibility, test status, and payment state, wrapped in error handling and enriched with status badges and controls.
frontend/src/components/hotel/GuestHotel: Dialog that displays a hotel’s room inventory with photos, pricing, and optional promotions in a scrollable layout.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelInvit: Restricted-access gate where hotels submit invite tokens for entry, showing validation, error feedback, and success handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form component that loads, edits, validates, and saves hotel profile details including name, classification, address, map link, country, and logo upload.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelRooms: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of hotel room inventory with validation, image uploads, and modal dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Provides a form to create guest stay records with principal validation and date handling before submitting to the backend.
frontend/src/components/payments/AdminPa: Admin interface for listing, confirming, and rejecting hotel subscription payments with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Displays payment instructions for a selected payment method along with reference details and copy-to-clipboard support.
Renders a radio-group selector for choosing a payment method such as PayPal, DANA, or GoPay.
frontend/src/components/profile/Principa: Shows the user's Internet Identity principal ID and provides a button to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Displays a dialog prompting users to create a profile, auto-opening when no profile exists and handling form submission to save name and email.
frontend/src/components/stays/StayHistor: Fetches and displays the user's stay history with loading, error, empty, refresh, and list states.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountStatus.ts: Queries the backend for the caller's account status, keyed by principal ID, with loading and refetch helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Safely initializes a backend actor with timeouts, health checks, access control setup, and exposes readiness and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPayments.ts: Provides admin APIs to list, confirm, and reject payment requests using actor-safe querying and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecoveryDiagn: Fetches admin recovery diagnostics for the current principal with optional enabling and scoped caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminReset.ts: Handles restoring admin access via mutation and invalidates related admin and status queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendTestingMode: Retrieves backend testing-mode status with timeouts and actor-safe loading handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides hooks for creating bookings and fetching a caller's booking lists, including error normalization and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBrowseHotels.ts: Defines hooks to fetch hotel lists, optionally filtered by country or including principals, with actor readiness checks and retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Contains hooks to load the current user's profile, role, and admin status with identity-scoped caching and timeout protection.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelAccess.ts: Combines invite and admin checks to determine whether a user can access hotel-related areas and UI elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelInvites.ts: Provides hooks for checking invite status, consuming invite tokens, generating new tokens, and listing all tokens with caching updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelProfile.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and saving a hotel's profile with timeout protection and optimistic cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHotelVisibilityAdm: Admin-focused hooks for retrieving hotel visibility stats and updating visibility or payment status with corresponding cache invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNextStep.ts: Manages a per-user 'next step' roadmap selection with localStorage persistence, keyed by principal when available.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentRequest.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and checking subscription status of payment requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomInventory.ts: Offers mutations to update or delete room inventory with timeout handling and cache invalidation scoped by user identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useStayHistory.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and create stay history records, scoping queries by principal and using timeouts for backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestingMode.ts: Tracks a boolean testing mode flag with localStorage persistence and toggle support for showing test hotels.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Defines a lightweight i18n system with EN/ID dictionaries and utilities for storing language preference.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context with language selection, persistence, and translation lookup for child components.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables, layout rules, and mobile/iOS-specific adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint that initializes React, sets up QueryClient, wraps the app in InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Renders the account status page with panels, admin-only troubleshooting and recovery tools, and hash-based auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Displays the admin control panel with multiple admin tools and a watchdog for admin verification timeouts.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotels.tsx: Lists hotels with filtering, testing mode handling, and booking dialogs, with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest account details, profile info, bookings, and stay history with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GuestArea.tsx: Landing page for guests offering navigation to browsing, account pages, and hotel area options based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/HotelArea.tsx: Main hotel management page handling access checks, profile setup, subscription status, and rendering management tabs and components.
frontend/src/pwa/cleanupServiceWorker.ts: Utility that unregisters all service workers and clears caches once per version to fix stale SW issues.
frontend/src/pwa/registerSW.ts: Registers the service worker, checks for updates, and dispatches a custom event when a new version is available.
frontend/src/pwa/SwUpdatePrompt.tsx: Empty file placeholder for service worker update prompt UI.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats numeric amounts into locale-specific currency strings based on RoomCurrency.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Normalizes various error types into user-friendly messages with special handling for IC, validation, timeout, and permission errors.
frontend/src/utils/replicaRejection.ts: Detects IC replica rejection or stopped-canister errors and extracts canister IDs to produce clearer error info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation, including hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects with a custom error if it exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for an SGO web app, listing current UI cleanup tasks, deployment issues, and pending feature requests.
